properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 11 at 11:08AM EST until January 12 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Gray ME
properties.description:
...Icing is likely Tonight into Sunday...

.Rain will transition to freezing rain, and may become mixed with
sleet or snow in interior central Maine late tonight into Sunday
morning for portions of far northern New Hampshire through central
and midcoast Maine. The freezing rain could produce ice
accretions of up to a third of an inch.

* WHAT...Freezing rain expected, possibly mixed with sleet or snow.
Total snow and sleet accumulations of up to one inch and ice
accumulations of up to one quarter of an inch expected.

* WHERE...Kennebec and Interior Waldo Counties.

* WHEN...From 4 AM to 7 PM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Some power outages and tree damage are likely due to
the ice. Travel could be nearly impossible.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

For a more precise forecast for your specific location...go to
www.weather.gov/gray..

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 7 PM EST SUNDAY
